title: Brochure, "Building Brochure for the Munson-Williams-Proctor Institute, Utica, New York", 1964
medium: Lithography in red, blue, black and brown ink on off-white wove paper with a leaflet of tracing paper around te outside
inscribed:
Imprinted on cover on tracing paper across the bottom in red ink: Munson-Williams-Proctor Institute
On back cover at lower left: Utica, New York
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The front cover has a photograph of the museum. Inside are text and images explaining the history, purpose and collection of the museum.

exhibitions.title: Elaine Lustig Cohen, Modern Graphic Designer
